column6: SECOND COMING, CHAPTER TWO The race to find Cable and Hope is on, but who will get to them first? Will it be Cyclops and the X-Men or Bastion and his mutant-hating cabal? Cyclops isn't waiting for the answer to that as takes the fight directly to Bastion with the New Mutants! Rated T  ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Terry Dodson | penciller:Mike Perkins | writer:Matt Fraction
